snippet: With a new line of crackers made from unconventional ingredients, Mondelez is going after a larger slice of the $6.2 billion snack business.
abstract: Mondelez International announces it is introducing line of savory crackers called Good Thins, which focuses on unconventional snack ingredients; is first new product line company has produced in years.
lead_paragraph: With a new line of crackers made from unconventional ingredients, Mondelez is going after a larger slice of the $6.2 billion snack business.

headline.main: To Reinvigorate Sales, Mondelez Reimagines the Snack
headline.print_headline: To Feed Sales, Companies Are Reimagining the Snack
